sentences.sContent: Mixed with other plasticizers, volatile and can overcome the disadvantages such as low temperature crystallization.
sentences.sContent_eng: Mixed with other plasticizers, volatile and can overcome the disadvantages such as low temperature crystallization.
sentences.sCn: 与其他增塑剂混用，可以克服挥发性大和低温结晶化等缺点。

sentences.sContent: In fact, every great invention, is the crystallization of wisdom of the scientists, which includes their sweat and effort.
sentences.sContent_eng: In fact, every great invention, is the crystallization of wisdom of the scientists, which includes their sweat and effort.
sentences.sCn: 其实，每一项重大发明，都是科学家们智慧的结晶，里面包涵着他们的汗水和心血。

sentences.sContent: The finned crystallizers were compared with the horizontal crystallizers in efficiency and power consumption of crystallization process.
sentences.sContent_eng: The finned crystallizers were compared with the horizontal crystallizers in efficiency and power consumption of crystallization process.
sentences.sCn: 通过分析开车数据，对翅片式结晶器与卧式结晶器的结晶效率、结晶电耗进行比较。

phrases.pCn: 分离结晶；分步结晶；分馏结晶作用；分级析晶
